mapper.select: select reply_code, reply_content, reply_del, reply_date, board_num, userid from reply
select reply_code, reply_content, reply_del, reply_date, board_num, userid from reply where reply_code=#{reply_code}
select reply_code, reply_content, reply_del, reply_date, board_num, userid from reply where board_num=#{board_num}
mapper.insert: insert into reply (reply_code, reply_content, reply_date, board_num, userid) values (#{reply_code}, #{reply_content}, sysdate, #{board_num},#{userid})
